document_data.name: The Golden Stag
document_data.mainbody: The '''Golden Stag''' was an adventuring company active in the [[Moonsea]] region during the late–9{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Their claim to fame was destroying the [[lich]] [[Vingril]] when he tried to destroy the [[Cormyrean]] [[cog]] they were hired to protect from pirates from [[Melvaunt]].
